00020 /* Class for creating form with element based on simbio form elements */

00022 require 'simbio_form_element.inc.php';

00033 class simbio_form_maker_anything extends abs_simbio_form_element
00034 {
00035     public $content = '';
00036 
00037     public function out()
00038     {
00039         return $this->content;

00053 class simbio_form_maker
00054 {
00055     public $submit_target = '_self';
00056     protected $elements = array();
00057     protected $hidden_elements = array();
00058     protected $form_name = '';
00059     protected $form_method = '';
00060     protected $form_action = '';
00061     protected $disable = '';
00062     protected $enable_upload = true;
00063 
00072     public function __construct($str_form_name = 'mainForm', $str_form_action = '', $str_form_method = 'post', $bool_enable_upload = true)
00073     {
00074         $this->form_name = $str_form_name;
00075         $this->form_action = $str_form_action;
00076         $this->form_method = $str_form_method;
00077         $this->enable_upload = $bool_enable_upload;
00078     }
00079 
00085     public function startForm()
00086     {
00087         return '<form name="'.$this->form_name.'" id="'.$this->form_name.'" '
00088             .'method="'.$this->form_method.'" '
00089             .'action="'.$this->form_action.'" target="'.$this->submit_target.'"'.($this->enable_upload?' enctype="multipart/form-data"':'').'>';
00090     }
00091 
00092 
00098     public function endForm()
00099     {
00100         return '</form>';
00101     }
00102 
00103 
00108     protected function printOut()
00109     {
00110         // please extends this method
00111     }
00112 
00113 
00125     public function addTextField($str_elmnt_type, $str_elmnt_name, $str_elmnt_label, $str_elmnt_value = '', $str_elmnt_attr = '', $str_elmnt_info = '')
00126     {
00127         // create instance
00128         $_form_element = new simbio_fe_text();
00129         // set form element object properties
00130         $_form_element->element_type = $str_elmnt_type;
00131         $_form_element->element_name = $str_elmnt_name;
00132         $_form_element->element_value = $str_elmnt_value;
00133         $_form_element->element_attr = $str_elmnt_attr;
00134         $this->elements[$str_elmnt_name] = array('label' => $str_elmnt_label, 'element' => $_form_element, 'info' => $str_elmnt_info);
00135     }
00136 
00137 
00149     public function addSelectList($str_elmnt_name, $str_elmnt_label, $array_option, $str_default_selected = '', $str_elmnt_attr = '', $str_elmnt_info = '')
00150     {
00151         // create instance
00152         $_form_element = new simbio_fe_select();
00153         // set form element object properties
00154         $_form_element->element_name = $str_elmnt_name;
00155         $_form_element->element_options = $array_option;
00156         $_form_element->element_value = $str_default_selected;
00157         $_form_element->element_attr = $str_elmnt_attr;
00158         $this->elements[$str_elmnt_name] = array('label' => $str_elmnt_label, 'element' => $_form_element, 'info' => $str_elmnt_info);
00159     }
00160 
00161 
00172     public function addCheckBox($str_elmnt_name, $str_elmnt_label, $array_chbox, $default_checked = '', $str_elmnt_info = '')
00173     {
00174         // create instance
00175         $_form_element = new simbio_fe_checkbox();
00176         // set form element object properties
00177         $_form_element->element_name = $str_elmnt_name;
00178         $_form_element->element_options = $array_chbox;
00179         $_form_element->element_value = $default_checked;
00180         $this->elements[$str_elmnt_name] = array('label' => $str_elmnt_label, 'element' => $_form_element, 'info' => $str_elmnt_info);
00181     }
00182 
00183 
00194     public function addRadio($str_elmnt_name, $str_elmnt_label, $array_option, $default_checked = '', $str_elmnt_info = '')
00195     {
00196         // create instance
00197         $_form_element = new simbio_fe_radio();
00198         // set form element object properties
00199         $_form_element->element_name = $str_elmnt_name;
00200         $_form_element->element_options = $array_option;
00201         $_form_element->element_value = $default_checked;
00202         $this->elements[$str_elmnt_name] = array('label' => $str_elmnt_label, 'element' => $_form_element, 'info' => $str_elmnt_info);
00203     }
00204 
00205 
00217     public function addDateField($str_elmnt_name, $str_elmnt_label, $str_elmnt_value = '', $str_elmnt_attr = '', $str_elmnt_info = '')
00218     {
00219         $this->addTextField('date', $str_elmnt_name, $str_elmnt_label, $str_elmnt_value, $str_elmnt_attr, $str_elmnt_info);
00220     }
00221 
00222 
00230     public function addHidden($str_elmnt_name, $str_elmnt_value)
00231     {
00232         $_form_element = new simbio_fe_text();
00233         $_form_element->element_type = 'hidden';
00234         $_form_element->element_name = $str_elmnt_name;
00235         $_form_element->element_value = $str_elmnt_value;
00236         $this->hidden_elements[] = $_form_element;
00237     }
00238 
00239 
00247     public function addAnything($str_elmnt_label, $str_content)
00248     {
00249         $_form_element = new simbio_form_maker_anything();
00250         $_form_element->content = $str_content;
00251         $this->elements[] = array('label' => $str_elmnt_label, 'element' => $_form_element, 'info' => null);
00252     }
00253 
00254 
00262     public function addFormObject($str_elmnt_label, $obj_simbio_fe, $str_elmnt_info = '')
00263     {
00264         $this->elements[$obj_simbio_fe->element_name] = array('label' => $str_elmnt_label, 'element' => $obj_simbio_fe, 'info' => $str_elmnt_info);
00265     }
00266 }
